nodes.text: The Weapon of a Jedi is a short animated comic based on excerpts of the 2015 junior novel The Weapon of a Jedi: A Luke Skywalker Adventure, written by Jason Fry, with art by Will Sliney and Nolan Woodard. It was created by the multinational food and beverage company Nestlé as part of a licensed Star Wars–themed promotional campaign, along with Smuggler's Run. The two animated comics were originally offered exclusively on the now-defunct Nestlé Comics website by typing a digital code featured on every box of Nestlé cereals.
